title: A Carbone on Every Continent: Major Food Group Moves Beyond New York
description: The restaurant hotshots have New York in their DNA and several opulent new places in Florida. But their sights are set on cities around the world.
dc:creator: Julia Moskin

media:content.media:credit: Rose Marie Cromwell for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Cabaret performers wearing lingerie served wine at the opening party for Contessa, the new restaurant from Major Food Group in Miamiâ€™s Design District.
